data.name: Okta - Overview Dashboard
data.description: This dashboard provides an overview of Okta events such as top Okta events and their details, actions by users, user details, login events, etc.

widgets.title: Okta - All Requests Over Time
widgets.description: Provides insights into all the Okta events over time

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| groupby $m.timestamp /$p.timeRange.suggestedInterval as timestamp, $m.severity agg count() as count

widgets.title: Okta Events By Top Browser Types
widgets.description: Provides insights into Okta events by the top requested browser type

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter client.userAgent.browser != null
| groupby client.userAgent.browser agg count() as count

widgets.title: Okta Events By Event Types
widgets.description: Provides insights into Okta events by their types. The types can be authentications, policy evaluation, etc.

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
|filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
|filter displayMessage != null
| groupby displayMessage agg count() as count

widgets.title: Okta Events By Top Source Country
widgets.description: Provides insights into top source countries

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
|filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter client.geographicalContext.country != null
| groupby client.geographicalContext.country agg count() as count

widgets.title: Top Deactivated Application
widgets.description: Provides insights into top deactivated applications

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
|filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter displayMessage == 'MFA factor deactivated'
| groupby $l.applicationname aggregate count() as $d.deactivation_count | orderby $d.deactivation_count desc

widgets.title: Top Deleted Applications
widgets.description: Provides insights into top deleted applications

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
|filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter eventType ~ 'deletion' || displayMessage ~ 'deletion' 
| groupby eventType as eventType, displayMessage as displayMessage aggregate count() as deletion_count 
| orderby $d.deletion_count desc

widgets.title: Okta Actions By Top 10 Actors
widgets.description: Provides insights into top 10 actors performing actions

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter actor.displayName != null
| groupby actor.displayName aggregate count() as action_count 
| orderby $d.action_count desc 
| limit 10

widgets.title: Okta Events Types By User
widgets.description: Provides insights into top Okta event types by users

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter actor.displayName != null
| groupby actor.displayName as user, eventType as type agg count() as count

widgets.title: Admin Access By Top Users
widgets.description: Provides insights into top users accessing Okta admin app

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter displayMessage == 'User accessing Okta admin app' 
| groupby userDisplayName aggregate count() as access_count 
| orderby access_count desc

widgets.title: Okta Users Created In Time Range
widgets.description: Provides insights into users created in a specific range of time

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter debugContext.debugData.detailedmessage ~ 'Object creation phase'

widgets.title: Top Password Update Events By Users & Outcome
widgets.description: Provides insights into top password updates events by users and the respective outcome of success and failure

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter eventType ~ 'password'
| groupby userDisplayName, outcome.result as outcome aggregate count() as event_count
| orderby $d.event_count desc

widgets.title: Account Lockout Events By User
widgets.description: Provides insights into top user account lockout events by users

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter eventType ~ 'lockout' && $d ~~ 'user'

widgets.title: Number Of Password Change Events In Time Range
widgets.description: Provides insights into count of number of password changes events in a specific range of time

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
|filter eventType.matches(/(pplication.user_membership.change_password|application.user_membership.show_password|user.account.update_password|user.account.reset_password|application.provision.user.push_okta_password)/)
| count

widgets.title: Failed Login By Users
widgets.description: Provides insights into top users failed login attempts

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter legacyEventType == 'core.user_auth.login_failed'

widgets.title: Failed Password Reset By Users
widgets.description: Provides insights into top users failed password reset attempts

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter displayMessage ~ 'password reset' && displayMessage ~ 'failed' 
| groupby userDisplayName as username aggregate count() as failed_reset_count

widgets.title: Failed Authentication By Users
widgets.description: Provides insights into top users failed authentication attempts

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter eventType ~ 'auth' 
| groupby eventType, outcome.reason aggregate count() as $d.failed_auth_count

widgets.title: Failed Authentication By Source IPs
widgets.description: Provides insights into top source IPs for failed authentication attempts

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter debugContext.debugData.suspiciousActivity != null 
| groupby client.ipAddress aggregate count() as $d.failed_auth_count

widgets.title: Authentication Failure Reasons
widgets.description: Provides insights into top reasons for failed authentication attempts

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter outcome.reason != null
| groupby outcome.reason aggregate count() as failure_reason_count

widgets.title: Successful Login Requests By Location
widgets.description: Provides insights into top source locations where successful login requests originated from

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter eventType == 'user.authentication.sso' 
| groupby request.ipChain.geographicalContext.country,request.ipChain.geographicalContext.city aggregate count() as $d.successful_logins

widgets.title: Failed Login Requests By Location
widgets.description: Provides insights into top source locations where failed login requests originated from

dataprimeQuery.text:
source logs 
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'okta_logs'
| filter outcome.reason ~ 'CHALLENGE'
| groupby request.ipChain.geographicalContext.country,request.ipChain.geographicalContext.city aggregate count() as logins
